This is a recent rough draft, but it needs improvement.

Think about the object structure a bit.  You want a "CAddress factory", that will create one or more CAddress's from a DNS lookup.  Supporting a multiple-address lookup from _inside_ a singleton address object is awkward, because DNS lookups have a one-to-many relationship between DNS names and addresses.

I agree, actually. I moved the lookup code to a NameLookup function that creates a CAddress or a vector of those, and is used in the (single-address only) lookup version of the CAddress constructor, for convenience.\n

My finger was hovering over the "Merge pull request" button, but I found a last minute issue.

Eventually, we do want to support IPv6.  Satoshi reserved space for it in the P2P protocol address storage area, and it will be needed in years to come, to connect some clients.
